document.discussion_title: Jay Electronica Apologizes To Kendrick Lamar & Announces Chance The Rapper Collaboration
document.topic_text: Leave a comment Jay Electronica put his ego aside to apologize for his past transgressions. It’s no secret that Jay Electronica had issues with Kendrick Lamar and dissed Drake, J. Cole, and 50 Cent . But today, he’s apologizing for it. Well, everyone didn’t get an apology, but K.Dot and 50 Cent received peace and blessings from the Roc Nation rapper. lastly, peace to K dot and TDE because regardless to whom or what we are brothers fighting the same enemy. forgive my past transgressions — سيف الله (@JayElectronica) April 24, 2016 peace to 50 as well. that's my brother and I love him. I'm just waiting for him to let his greatness shine. — سيف الله (@JayElectronica) April 24, 2016 Jay Elec also announced that he has a new collaboration with Chicago’s Chance The Rapper . Jay tweeted, “ we about to surprise attack y’all. Well I guess it ain’t a surprise no more .” Peace To Chance The Rapper. We about to surprise attack y'all. well i guess it aint a surprise no more. But its still an attack! lol — سيف الله (@JayElectronica) April 23, 2016 No word on when we’ll be getting Jay Elec and Chance’s collaboration, but Summer Sixteen seems to be the most popular release time. SOURCE: Twitter | PHOTO CREDIT: Getty
